name: d3-force-reuse
description: Fast force-directed graph layout by reusing Barnes Hut approximations.

scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3-force-reuse.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-reuse.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/d3-force-reuse.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-force-reuse.js build/d3-force-reuse.min.js
